title.value: Estimated Gestational Age Code Including Method

description.value: This value set contains codes to describe that the template in which they are used represents the estimated gestational age . If the method of determination by which the gestational age was was estimated is known it is included in the code.

display.value: Gestational age Estimated from last menstrual period
Gestational age Estimated from patient reported estimated date of conception
Gestational age Estimated from conception date
Gestational age Estimated from ovulation date
Gestational age Estimated from prior assessment
Gestational age Estimated from selected delivery date
Gestational age estimated from Gestational sac diameter on US
Gestational age estimated from Abdominal circumference on US
Gestational age estimated from Binocular distance on US
Gestational age estimated from Crown rump length on US
Gestational age estimated from Femur length on US
Gestational age estimated from Head circumference on US
Delivery date Estimated from date fundal height reaches umb
